title: Fifteen Years of Waiting for Migratory Birds - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Romance   Slice of Life   Tragedy
author: YingFeng   盈风
description:
Li Li had a scar within her heart,

she cut off the threads to her career, life and love,

this was a scar left by Pei Shangxuan,

which can never be erased.

After fifteen years, Pei Shangxuan was at last in love with Li Li,

however, her love for him has already gone.

It turns out that love is not a migratory bird,

as it has no return date.>
